short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all urls currently open in the browser and open urls from a text file, also works in incognito mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Manage URLs in Chrome: Export, Import and Incognito Support

- Export the URLs currently active in your Chrome browser tabs to a text file.
- You can import URLs from a text file to open them in new Chrome browser tabs.

Additionally, this extension is compatible with incognito mode. To use it in incognito mode, follow these steps:
- Open the Chrome extension options window.
- Toggle the "Allow in Incognito" option to the "on" position.

It's important to note that we do not collect or store your browser history. This Chrome extension is designed solely for your convenience, allowing you to easily export multiple URLs from your tabs to a text file and load URLs from a text file into new tabs in your browser."
